page.title: 17MEDICAL CARE NEAR TIVIDALE
page.content: There is one general medical practice, with four doctors in partnership. The area is also served by a neighbourhood clinic which cares for children from the local junior school. The clinic is involved with foot-care, dental-care, and pre-natal care. Some groups such as Mothers and Toddlers and the Over 60's also meet there. Periodically a nurse will visit the junior school to look at hair, nails and feet. She also does a thorough eye test. Sometimes a doctor will visit the school to give children a medical examination and also a dentist will visit to examine teeth.
